Water Dragon's Shamaness Parme: (As she listens, the Shamaness continues to tenderly hold her head in her hands.) Uhh... Uhh... ... Ahh! I remember everything now. Thank you very much. There is so much to tell, but... It would be best to leave this place first. I will go to a secret location to take care of a number of tasks for the Water Dragon that cannot be delayed. I am sorry to not be able to tell you more, even after you saved me. But it is that important... I will teleport you outside. (The Shamaness begins to write a letter.) Please deliver this letter to Kanis. We must go now! (The Shamaness concentrates for a moment and then begins chanting a spell.)
